text: Temple Run 2 is a video game for Android. It was released in January 17, 2013 by Imangi Studios. It was produced, designed and programmed by Keith Sheperd and Natalia Luckyanova. The art was by Kiril Tchangov. As of June 2014, Temple Run and Temple Run 2, it has been download over 1 billion times. == References == Category:2013 video games Category:3D platformers Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Endless runner games Category:IOS games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video game sequels
title: Temple Run 2
